question:
You live in a room in college which you share with another student.
However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find it
very difficult to work.
Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In the letter,
• describe the situation
• explain your problems and why it is difficult to work
• say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I'm writing to let you know that I am unhappy about the condition of my current life. As you can see I am a student in this college who Also work on a part-time job. However, my Housemate cousing a lot of problems to me, which make it extremely impposible for me to not complain.

Let me explain How depressed my situation is. Every night I get back Home from a very long day , The other student I share my room with keep playing a lot of Video games,Enjoy watching Movies with a really High volume whats make it obviously impposible for me to take a rest. That even The other students are complain about. Even though he has some unresponseple attitudes still,the real problem is that we do not have a well-orgenized arrangement in our dorm.
Would you kindly solve this serious situation by eathier,send me or him to another Room ?

Also, you can talk with the dorm's security to not let anyone enter the dorm, unless he have his student's ID card. Because as you see, Almost Every night we have that kind of All-night noisy parties. I will really appreciate it if all my suggestions are taking in mind.
Lastly,Than you for your consideration. I am looking forward to the new Developments.
